summary: Adds two rooms, an Armory on the first floor and a storage nook in the basement as well as some storage containers near the Alchemy bench.
descriptionHtml:
Update to Version 2.0

I completely rearranged the Armory to add light and make sure all the display areas were functioning properly. The Armory will now display, 14 weapons, 8 suits, with additional spots for 15 additional shields. There are now two wardrobes in the room for storage. I intentionally slid the lighting emphasis away from the weapons to highlight the glow effects on many of the weapons.

ATTENTION:
If you have the previous version please remove your items from the displays before updating.
author: Chemist18
